code: @Override public void write(String path, ArrayList<IN> tupleList) {     try (PrintWriter outStream = new PrintWriter(new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(path, true)))) {         for (IN tupleToWrite : tupleList) {             outStream.println(tupleToWrite).         }     } catch (IOException e) {         throw new RuntimeException("Exception occured while writing file " + path, e).     } }
